result_list.explanation: Elle dit ceci bas. (She says this low.) This indicates an aside, where the character addresses the audience or is alone.
Ensemble (Together.) This suggests a musical direction, indicating that the choir or characters will sing together.
Avec émotion. (With emotion.) This describes the delivery manner, indicating the emotion in the character's voice.
D'un ton sévère. (In a severe tone.) This describes the delivery manner, indicating the tone of the character's voice.
Plus haut encore. (Even louder.) This describes the delivery manner, indicating the volume of the character's voice.
Il dit en riant les derniers mots. (He says the last words laughing.) This describes the delivery manner, indicating laughter in the character's voice.
result_list.stgdir: Il dit en riant les derniers mots.

result_list.explanation: Le choeur chantera : Tulit ergo Dominas hominem. Alors, Dieu, étendant la main vers te paradis, dira : (The choir will sing: Tulit ergo Dominas hominem. Then, God, extending his hand towards paradise, will say:) This is a long stage direction with narrative quality, intended for readers.

result_list.explanation: Il fond en larmes. (He bursts into tears.) This is a general character action, indicating an emotional reaction.
La voix reprend. (The voice resumes.) This describes the delivery manner, indicating the continuation of the character's voice.
Il répète ces quatre vers. (He repeats these four lines.) This describes the delivery manner, indicating the repetition of the character's lines.
